attributes.title: What Enlightens Your Senses and Mind?
attributes.description:
March 19, 2015


Today’s (19th March, 2015) Morning Satsang continues with the Upanishads Series - Living Advaita. 

Isha Upanishad – Verse 6:

yastu sarvāṇi bhūtāny  ātmany-evānupaśyati |
sarva-bhūteṣu cātmānaṁ  tato na vijugupsate  || 6 ||

Paramahamsa Nithyananda urges us to look at the utility value of everything and everyone in our life, finding instead the quality in those things, especially with our own senses. Meditating on the quality of “I” will lead us to see how we exist in everything; there is nothing in which we do not exist.
